def max_beauty_of_subsegment(a, n):
    m1 = max(a)
    a.pop(a.index(m1))
    m2 = max(a)
    mi1 = min(a)
    a.pop(a.index(mi1))
    mi2 = min(a)
    max_beauty = m1 + m2 - mi1 + mi2
    return max_beauty

def max_beauty_of_subsegment(a, n):
    m1 = max(a)
    a.pop(a.index(m1))
    m2 = max(a)
    mi1 = min(a)
    a.pop(a.index(mi1))
    mi2 = min(a)
    max_beauty = (m1 + m2 - mi1) * mi2
    return max_beauty

def max_beauty_of_subsegment(a, n):

    max_beauty = m1 + m2 + mi1 - mi2

def max_beauty_of_subsegment(a, n):

def max_beauty_of_subsegment(a, n):
    m1 = max(a)
    a.pop(a.index(m1))
    m2 = max(a)
    mi1 = min(a)
    a.pop(a.index(mi1))
    mi2 = min(a)
    max_beauty = m1 * m2 - mi1 - mi2
    return max_beauty
